CustomField.formula: RecordType.Name = 'Pipeline Client' && TEXT(Status__c) = 'Active' && (Current_Contract_Calling_Start_Date__c != null || Director__c != null || Sales_Manager_Director__c != null || Inside_Sales_Manager__c != null || Assistant_Partner_Sales_Manager__c != null || Current_PSR__c != null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Temp field created by Jessica to demonstrate which accounts are populated by Batch Account Metrics vs Batch Pipeline Account Metrics
CustomField.label: Batch Account Metrics
